# Data Exploration

## Fire Data





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}


```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
fire_data <- read_csv("data/fire_data.csv")
```



:::
:::





### Cleaning





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```

Attaching package: 'janitor'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```
The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    chisq.test, fisher.test
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
library(lubridate)

fire_data_clean <- fire_data %>%
  clean_names() %>%                             
  distinct() %>%                                
  drop_na(fire_year, fire_id, ig_date) %>%      
  mutate(
    ig_date = mdy(ig_date),                     
    perim_source = str_to_upper(perim_source),  
    ecoregion_10 = str_to_title(ecoregion_10),  
    country = str_to_title(country),            
    extreme_day = replace_na(extreme_day, FALSE) 
  )
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
fire_summary <- fire_data_clean %>%
  group_by(fire_id, fire_year) %>%
  summarise(
    total_area = max(area_ha, na.rm = TRUE),
    start_date = min(ig_date),
    end_date = max(ig_date),
    .groups = "drop"
  )
```
:::





### Visual





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
fire_data_clean %>%
  group_by(fire_year) %>%
  summarise(total_area = sum(area_ha, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = fire_year, y = total_area)) +
  geom_col(fill = "red") +
  labs(
    title = "Total Burned Area per Year",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Total Area Burned (ha)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](lab-7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::





### Test





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
t.test(days_burned ~ extreme_day, data = fire_data_clean)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Welch Two Sample t-test

data:  days_burned by extreme_day
t = -21.545, df = 13997, p-value < 2.2e-16
alternative hypothesis: true difference in means between group FALSE and group TRUE is not equal to 0
95 percent confidence interval:
 -6.274737 -5.228198
sample estimates:
mean in group FALSE  mean in group TRUE 
           27.21150            32.96297 
```


:::
:::





## Vegetation Data





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
vegetation_data <- read_csv("data/vegetation_data.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```
Rows: 1069 Columns: 19
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (9): EVT_NAME, EVT_FUEL_N, EVT_LF, EVT_PHYS, EVT_GP_N, SAF_SRM, EVT_ORD...
dbl (10): VALUE, LFRDB, EVT_FUEL, EVT_GP, R, G, B, RED, GREEN, BLUE

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
glimpse(vegetation_data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

$ EVT_PHYS   <chr> "Fill-NoData", "Shrubland", "Riparian", "Riparian", "Shrubl…

$ EVT_CLASS  <chr> "Fill-NoData", "Dwarf Shrubland", "Shrubland", "Shrubland",…
$ EVT_SBCLS  <chr> "Fill-NoData", "Deciduous", "Deciduous shrubland", "Deciduo…
$ R          <dbl> 255, 255, 18, 18, 146, 255, 255, 255, 146, 182, 182, 133, 2…
$ G          <dbl> 255, 205, 76, 76, 237, 37, 153, 211, 237, 250, 250, 39, 129…
$ B          <dbl> 255, 112, 135, 135, 224, 13, 10, 119, 224, 227, 227, 8, 34,…
$ RED        <dbl> 1.000000, 1.000000, 0.070588, 0.070588, 0.572549, 1.000000,…

$ BLUE       <dbl> 1.000000, 0.439216, 0.529412, 0.529412, 0.878431, 0.050980,…
```


:::
:::





### Cleaning





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
vegetation_data_clean <- vegetation_data %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  distinct() %>%
  filter(value != -9999) %>%
  mutate(
    evt_name = str_to_title(evt_name),
    evt_fuel_n = str_to_title(evt_fuel_n),
    evt_lf = str_to_title(evt_lf),
    evt_phys = str_to_title(evt_phys),
    evt_gp_n = str_to_title(evt_gp_n),
    evt_order = str_to_title(evt_order),
    evt_class = str_to_title(evt_class),
    evt_sbcls = str_to_title(evt_sbcls)
  )
```
:::






### Visual





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
vegetation_data_clean %>%
  count(evt_class, sort = TRUE) %>%
  top_n(10, n) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(evt_class, n), y = n)) +
  geom_col(fill = "forestgreen") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(
    title = "Top Vegetation Classes",
    x = "Vegetation Class",
    y = "Count"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](lab-7_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::





### Test





::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
veg_counts <- table(vegetation_data_clean$evt_lf)
chisq.test(veg_counts)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```

	Chi-squared test for given probabilities

data:  veg_counts
X-squared = 1807.8, df = 8, p-value < 2.2e-16
```


:::
:::
